choose.otherwise: `id` AS `id`, `accept_name` AS `acceptName`, `accept_businessId` AS `acceptBusinessId`, `accept_key` AS `acceptKey`, `accept_recharge_url` AS `acceptRechargeUrl`, `icon_url` AS `iconUrl`, `sort` AS `sort`, `status` AS `status`, `type` AS `type`, `remark` AS `remark`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `creater` AS `creater`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `updater` AS `updater`
